alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 8:52PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Jackson and northeastern Washington Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 752 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chipley to near Marianna. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chipley, Marianna, Sneads, Cottondale, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Alford, Richter Crossroads, Chipley Municipal Airport, Kynesville, Ridgetop, Blue Spring, Union City, Steele City, Sink Creek, Star, Round Lake, Simsville, Cypress and Cottondale Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
